title: PLAZA ORB / hardie volition afterthought
description:
*Why didn't anyone hear the shot?*
On plaza once "convince hardie boys to tell you where ruby is = done" and Klaasje is not arrested and Skillset Compromised is done too.

dialogueTree.title: Volition: "You think you have a pretty hot sus..."
dialogueTree.text: You think you have a pretty hot suspect right now, don't you? That Ruby of yours.

links.title: You: "Yeah? And?"
links.text: Yeah? And?

links.title: Volition: "Notice how it came together without..."
links.text: Notice how it came together without casting too much suspicion on *Klaasje* -- it was nice and *Ruby-centric* in the end.

links.title: You: "What do you mean?"
links.text: What do you mean?

links.title: Volition: "Anything strike you a bit off about..."
links.text: Anything strike you a bit off about this mish-mash?

links.title: You: "Well... the bullet didn't have to c..."
links.text: Well... the bullet didn't have to come from the roof, it could have come from anywhere on the coast.

links.title: Volition: "Absolutely. It could have come from..."
links.text: Absolutely. It could have come from *anywhere*. But you're suddenly so certain it came from the roof behind the window.

links.title: You: "The bullet was jacketed -- these do..."
links.text: The bullet was jacketed -- these don't just lie around everywhere, do they...

links.title: Volition: "Good point. It is rather rare these..."
links.text: Good point. It is rather rare these days... But do continue.

links.title: You: "It turned out the bullet was an ant..."
links.text: It turned out the bullet was an antique...

links.title: Volition: "True. Strange how you conducted the..."
links.text: True. Strange how you conducted the whole *advanced ballistics analysis* and then hand-waved it?

links.title: You: "The footprints in the pinball works..."
links.text: The footprints in the pinball workshop didn't fit with the Odd Sole's prints on the crime scene...

links.title: Volition: "No, they didn't."
links.text: No, they didn't.

links.title: You: "So far no one has mentioned hearing..."
links.text: So far no one has mentioned hearing the shot.

links.title: Volition: "Notice how this hasn't come up at a..."
links.text: Notice how this hasn't come up at all -- even Hardie and his boys didn't mention it. Neither did you.

links.title: You: "Perhaps thinking that Ruby's fondne..."
links.text: Perhaps thinking that Ruby's fondness for girls might drive her to murder was a bit sensationalist.

links.title: Volition: "No-no, that wasn't sensationalist a..."
links.text: No-no, that wasn't sensationalist at all, that is a *perfectly* valid reason for someone to kill someone.

links.title: Suggestion: "See, even he acknowledges that it's..."
links.text: See, even he acknowledges that it's a good reason!

links.title: Volition: "Man, really? You're, like... just t..."
links.text: Man, really? You're, like... just the most compromised of them all. Man, maybe you should just fire this one, it's completely useless.

links.title: You: "I don't know, my roof route theory..."
links.text: I don't know, my roof route theory was solid.

links.title: Volition: "Yeah, the route was pretty solid. G..."
links.text: Yeah, the route was pretty solid. Good work there. Still...

links.title: You: "I'm done thinking about this. [Fini..."
links.text: I'm done thinking about this. [Finish thought.]

links.title: Volition: "That's right. *Finish thought*. Jus..."
links.text: That's right. *Finish thought*. Just finish it and conveniently go on. She's watching you leave right now, you know that? Free as a bird on that roof. Lighting up a cigarette and thinking: am I glad Ruby's in this shit and not me!

links.title: Logic: "Don't listen to this guy. The theor..."
links.text: Don't listen to this guy. The theory was solid. He's just jealous. Move on, it's no use harassing her further.

links.title: You: "I don't need this criticism right n..."
links.text: I don't need this criticism right now, this chapter is closed. [Discard thought.]
